biography: Okko is a highly accomplished golfer who calls Hirsala Golf his home club.  He brings a wealth of experience to the Hector Trophée, having competed in the event in 2022, 2023, and 2025.

His most significant achievement to date is his victory at the Hector Trophée VI, a testament to his skill and determination under pressure.  Okko is known for his strategic game and consistent performance, though he has had to overcome challenges with back problems throughout his career.

While he's yet to claim the Victor trophy for individual excellence, Okko remains a formidable competitor. His participation in the Hector Trophée year after year highlights his commitment to the event and his desire for continued success. We look forward to seeing what he can accomplish this year.
